about_the_game:
🌟 Join Our Discord Community! 🌟


🚀 Feeling bored? Come join our Discord community! Make new friends 👥, play together 🎮, and gain access to exclusive content! 🎁
✨ Events, giveaways 🎉, and the latest announcements 🌟 are waiting for you!
💡 You can also interact directly with our creative team, share your ideas, and report any issues. Let’s grow and have fun together! 😍

⚔️ Are You Ready for 1v1v1v1 Fun? ⚔️

🏆 Get ready for an intense competition with your friends! 🕹️ Play with friends, match with players on the server, or battle against bots. Choose from three unique maps: 🌍 World, 🌎 North America, or 🇹🇷 Turkey.
🃏 Use card abilities, strategize, and outsmart your opponents with your general knowledge!
🔥 Objective: Conquer rival capitals or defend your own!
🗨️ Chat 💬, make new friends 🤝,
🗣️ Play the game in 8 different languages!
(🇬🇧 English, 🇹🇷 Turkish, 🇫🇷 French, 🇳🇱 Dutch, 🇮🇳 Hindi, 🇨🇳 Chinese, 🇪🇸 Spanish, 🇧🇷 Portuguese).

🏙️ Capitals 🏙️

🏛️ Choose your capital carefully! It can be assigned randomly or selected by players, depending on room settings.
🛡️ Your capital, with 3 lives, should be in a strategic location. If your opponent wins 3 times in your capital, you’ll lose all your territories! 🙅‍♂️
🎯 Remember: Without a capital, you’re nothing!
🗡️ At the start of the game, all players fight to expand their capitals! Everyone in the room answers the same question.

⚔️ Attack! ⚔️

🎯 Attack a region of your opponent and show your strength! 🌟
🌍 Choose a border region to attack. Answer one of 5️⃣ different types of questions.
✅ Correct answer: Capture the region!
🏆 Conquer the opponent’s capital and claim victory! 🎉

🤔 Questions 🤔

🎭 Culture, 🎨 Art, ⚽ Sports, 🌍 Geography, 📰 Entertainment, 🔬 Science, 📜 History...
🤩 Enjoy the thrill of competition with fun and educational questions!
🌟 Questions are available in 8 different languages! Outsmart your rivals with your knowledge! 🧠

🃏 Surprise Your Rivals with Card Powers! 🃏

🃏 Turn your rival’s plans upside down!
🌍 For example, conquer all regions in Africa to earn the Africa Card, doubling your capital points!
✨ Plan your strategy and claim victory! 💪


🎮 Join now and reach new heights of competition and fun! ✨

name: Knowledge Domination

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: INTEL i3-4330
  • Memory: TBD MB RAM
  • Graphics: dx10+ Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Knowledge Domination is a multiplayer knowledge and strategy game♟️. Players attempt to conquer each other's territories by answering questions correctly. Gain special powers by rolling dice and catch your opponents off guard 🎲. If you lose your capital 🏛️, you lose the game ⛔.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Turkish*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Hindi*
*languages with full audio support
